Package seng202.group7.controllers.menus

Class GraphMenuController

java.lang.Object
seng202.group7.controllers.menus.GraphMenuController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class GraphMenuController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Graph Menu Controller is the class which controls which graph is displayed by the program.
Author:
Jack McCorkindale, Sam McMillan

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    GraphMenuController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void changeBeat()
    This method monitors every time a ward combo box is changed and then updates the beat ComboBox so only values are encapsulated by the corresponding ward is available to be selected by the user.
    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getChoices()
    Gets the values from crime type, ward, and beat combo box's and creates a string list of the values
    void initialize​(java.net.URL location, java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
    This method is run during the loading of the graph menu fxml file.
    void selectBarGraph()
    Method triggered when the user changes the value in the crime type combo box, Checks what selection is made and reloads the bar graph view.
    void selectLineGraph()
    Method triggered when the user clicks on the display graph button, Checks what selections have been made by the user in the crime type, ward and beat combo box's and displays the appropriate crime over time graph\

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • GraphMenuController

      public GraphMenuController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL location, java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
      This method is run during the loading of the graph menu fxml file. Uses a query to scan the database and gives the user the available choices for crime type and ward in the combo boxes
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - A URL object.
      resources - A ResourceBundle object.

    • changeBeat

      public void changeBeat()
      This method monitors every time a ward combo box is changed and then updates the beat ComboBox so only values are encapsulated by the corresponding ward is available to be selected by the user.

    • selectBarGraph

      public void selectBarGraph()
      Method triggered when the user changes the value in the crime type combo box, Checks what selection is made and reloads the bar graph view.

    • selectLineGraph

      public void selectLineGraph()
      Method triggered when the user clicks on the display graph button, Checks what selections have been made by the user in the crime type, ward and beat combo box's and displays the appropriate crime over time graph\

    • getChoices

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getChoices()
      Gets the values from crime type, ward, and beat combo box's and creates a string list of the values
      Returns:
      choices an ArrayList of strings to send to line graph view.
